papers.title: FruitQ-GradeX: Determining Fruit Quality and Grading with Explainable Deep Learning
papers.authors: Shibdas Dutta, Subhrendu Guha Neogi, Diya Chanda, Arpan Pramanik, Özgün Girgin, Enes Ladin Öncül
papers.conference: IEEE International Conference on Recent Trends and Innovation in Computing
papers.description: A multi-task deep learning framework for simultaneous fruit classification and quality assessment using multi-headed CNN. Achieves 98% fruit classification and 99% quality detection accuracy with Grad-CAM interpretability, deployed via Streamlit.

papers.title: CropSense: Explainable Deep Learning Framework for Accurate Quality Detection in Solanaceous Crops
papers.authors: Shibdas Dutta, Subhrendu Guha Neogi, Shiladitya Chowdhury, Vikrant Chole, Arpan Pramanik, Diya Chanda
papers.conference: IEEE International Conference on Recent Trends and Innovation in Computing
papers.description: Lightweight multi-headed CNN for potato and tomato quality classification. Achieves 99.9% crop classification and 98.5% quality detection accuracy with Grad-CAM visualizations, deployed via Streamlit for real-time precision agriculture.
